content:
Congratulations on updating your name on Netflix and Hulu! Now, let's get your Amazon account updated. Here's a step-by-step guide to help you update your name on Amazon:

**Update Your Name on Amazon:**

1. Sign in to your Amazon account on the Amazon website or mobile app.
2. Click on your name in the top right corner of the screen, then select "Account & Lists" from the dropdown menu.
3. Click on "Account" from the top menu bar.
4. Scroll down to the "Account settings" section.
5. Click on "Update account information".
6. Enter your new name in the "First name" and "Last name" fields.
7. Click "Save changes" to update your information.

**Tips:**

* Make sure you're signed in to the correct account before making changes.
* If you have multiple Amazon accounts, you'll need to update each account separately.
* If you're having trouble updating your name, you can contact Amazon customer support for assistance.
* Keep in mind that updating your name on Amazon might affect any ongoing orders or subscriptions. If you have any concerns, you can contact Amazon customer support for guidance.

**Additional Amazon Tips:**

* If you have an Amazon Prime membership, you might need to update your name on the Prime membership as well. You can do this by going to the "Prime" section of your account and following the same steps.
* If you have an Amazon credit card or other financial services linked to your account, you may need to update your name with those services separately.

Now that you've updated your name on Amazon, you're getting close to completing your name change updates! You just need to update your health insurance provider and dentist's office. Remember to take your time and double-check that all information is accurate before submitting the updates.
